questions.q:
Game: What's on the box?
Points: Participation - 5 points.
Gamemaster: Mike
questions.a:
Setup: Grab a box, write each players name on box.

How to play: Bounce quarter onto box. If it lands on someone's name take a drink. If it misses write a rule on the box.
Points: Participation - 5 points.
Win Condition: None - timed 15 minutes.
Gamemaster: Mike
